channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Pipeline: Stage View Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Pipeline: Stage View Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-43408|2024-08-03T13:32:57.398Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%3A%20stage%20view%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Pipeline: Stage View Plugin 2.26 and earlier does not correctly encode the ID of 'input' steps when using it to generate URLs to proceed or abort Pipeline builds, allowing attackers able to configure Pipelines to specify 'input' step IDs resulting in URLs that would bypass the CSRF protection of any target URL in Jenkins.
